sentences.en: He simply rehashed the same story.
sentences.cn: 他只是把同一个故事改头换面了一下。

sentences.en: His answer is just a rehash version of my lecture.
sentences.cn: 他的回答只不过是把我的讲义重复了一遍。

sentences.en: The Observer found the play "a feeble rehash of familiar Miller themes"
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》认为这部剧“是大家熟悉的米勒式主题的拙劣翻版”。

sentences.en: Why does Bernard rehash the incidents already discussed in the book?
sentences.cn: 为什么Bernard重讲书中已经讨论过的事件?

words.tran_cn: 改变；略加修改的老作品

trans.tran_en: to use the same ideas again in a new form that is not really different or better - used to show disapproval
